title: Execute Katalon Studio tests with Jenkins Pipeline Script (Jenkinsfile)
description: Jenkins Pipeline (Jenkinsfile) provides an extensible set of tools for modeling simple-to-complex delivery pipelines. To learn more about creating a Jenkinsfile, you can refer to this Jenkins document: Using a Jenkinsfile.
